patient_id: Unique anonymous/de-identified  ID for the patient from the provider
history: Cancer relevant comorbidity or eviromental exposure
ethnicity: Patient Ethnic group - self assessed - could also be derived from exome data
ethnicity_assessment_method: Patient Ethnic group assessment method-- self assessed - could also be derived from genetic data
initial_diagnosis: Diagnosis of the patient when first diagnosed at age_at_initial_diagnosis - this can be different than the diagnosis at the time of collection which is collected in the sample section - use a NCIT ontology term when possible. No acronyms.
age_at_initial_diagnosis: Can be prior to the age at which the tissue sample was collected for PDX implant , this is the age of first diagnostic. Can be exact age or binned in 10 y group (1-9, 10-19, ...)
